name: SNCR Monitoring and Register Setup
description: Set up Shariah Non-Compliance Risk (SNCR) monitoring framework to track, report, and remediate any Shariah breaches

steps.title: Establish SNCR Register
steps.description: Create dedicated register to log all potential and actual Shariah non-compliance incidents

requiredEvidence.description: Spreadsheet or system module for logging: incident date, description, severity, root cause, remediation
Policy defining: (1) What constitutes SNCR, (2) Severity levels (low/medium/high/critical), (3) Escalation thresholds

policyConstraints.constraint: Islamic financial institutions must identify, measure, and monitor SNCR

steps.title: Define Product-Specific SNCR Indicators
steps.description: Identify key Shariah compliance checkpoints and potential breach scenarios for this product

requiredEvidence.description: Document listing all potential SNCR scenarios for product (e.g., 'Rent collected before delivery', 'Asset used for prohibited purpose')
Quantitative indicators to monitor (e.g., '# of contracts without SSB approval', '# of late Takaful renewals')
How each SNCR indicator will be monitored (frequency, responsible party, escalation)

policyConstraints.constraint: SNCR monitoring must be embedded in operational workflows

steps.title: Implement SNCR Monitoring Workflow
steps.description: Set up automated alerts, periodic reviews, and escalation procedures for SNCR incidents

requiredEvidence.description: Automated alerts configured in core banking system or workflow platform
Calendar of periodic SNCR reviews (daily, weekly, monthly checks)
Step-by-step procedure: Who to notify, When to escalate, SSB notification requirements

policyConstraints.constraint: Shariah Review function must conduct regular reviews to detect non-compliance

steps.title: Establish Purification Workflow Link
steps.description: Link SNCR register to purification workflow so non-compliant income is automatically routed to charity

requiredEvidence.description: Standard Operating Procedure for calculating non-compliant income and donating to charity
Pre-approved list of charitable organizations for purification donations
Documented link: SNCR incident → Income calculation → Charity donation → Receipt logging

policyConstraints.constraint: Non-compliant income must be purified by donating to charity - cannot be retained

steps.title: SSB Reporting Framework
steps.description: Establish reporting cadence and format for SNCR incidents to Shariah Supervisory Board

requiredEvidence.description: Standardized report format for SSB: incident summary, root cause, remediation, lessons learned
Frequency of SNCR reporting to SSB (e.g., immediate for critical, quarterly for low severity)
SSB confirmation that reporting framework is adequate

policyConstraints.constraint: SSB must be promptly informed of all Shariah non-compliance incidents

monitoringNote: SNCR monitoring is continuous throughout product lifecycle. This module establishes the framework; actual monitoring occurs in operational workflows.
